Name | Commission | Sitting Fees
N Chandrasekaran, Chairman@ | - | 3.60
Aman Mehta | 315.00 | 4.80
V Thyagarajan* | 100.00 | 3.00
Prof Clayton M Christensen** | 75.00 | 0.30
Dr Ron Sommer | 220.00 | 5.10
O P Bhatt | 215.00 | 7.50
Aarthi Subramanian@@ | - | 5.70

paragraph 1: iv. Details of the Remuneration for the year ended March 31, 2019:
paragraph 2: a. Non-Executive Directors:
paragraph 3: @ As a policy, N Chandrasekaran, Chairman, has abstained from receiving commission from the
Company.
paragraph 4: @@ In line with the internal guidelines of the Company, no payment is made towards commission to
the Non-Executive Directors of the Company, who are in full time employment with any other Tata
company.
paragraph 5: * Relinquished the position of Independent Director w.e.f. July 10, 2018.
paragraph 6: ** Relinquished the position of Independent Director w.e.f. September 28, 2018.
paragraph 7: *** Appointed as an Additional and Independent Director w.e.f. December 18, 2018.
paragraph 8: **** Appointed as an Additional and Independent Director w.e.f. January 10, 2019.
